titleStmt.title: Hypotypōsis hygiainontōn logōn, a form of sound words, or, A scripture-catechism shewing what a Christian is to believe and practice in order to salvation : very useful for persons of all ages and capacities as well as children / composed by the pious and learned John Worthington D.D. deceased.
titleStmt.author: Worthington, John, 1618-1671.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
